DOC.detailed_description: Patients initially randomize 4 arm : 1. st arm R-DA-EPOCH-21 2. nd arm R-mNHL-BFM-90 3. rd arm R-DA-EPOCH-21 + auto-SCT 4. th arm R-mNHL-BFM-90 + auto-SCT Patients achieve complete remission 6 cycle R-DA-EPOCH-21 R-mNHL-BFM-90 immunochemotherapy continue observation ( 1st 2nd arm ) continue treatment Rituximab + BCNU+Etoposid+Ara-C+Melphalan ( R-BEAM ) follow auto-SCT ( 3rd 4th arm ) . Patients achieve partial remission 6 cycle R-DA-EPOCH-21 R-mNHL-BFM-90 immunochemotherapy continue treatment 2 cycle Rituximab+Dexamethasone+Ara-C+Cisplatin ( R-DHAP ) , continue observation ( 1st 2nd arm ) continue treatment R-BEAM , follow auto-SCT ( 3rd 4th arm ) .
